mapper.select: SELECT O.c_no, tck_num, title, postername, m_id, cnt, order_price, dis_price, d_fee, total_price, rec_name, rec_addr, rec_tel, msg, stus, dis_descrip FROM ticket_order O LEFT JOIN concert C ON O.c_no = C.c_no WHERE tck_num = #{tck_num}
SELECT D.tck_num, cseat, D.price FROM ticket_detail D LEFT JOIN ticket_order O ON D.tck_num = O.tck_num WHERE D.tck_num = #{tck_num}
